name: Play Basketball 2016
description:
Play Play Basketball 2016 at your iPhone and iPad Smartphone.
Attention basketball fanatics!
Test your basketball practice and shot techniques in #1 Basketball game - Basketball Mania
A Real fun way to play Basketball!

- Side to side basket movement for challenging play!
Fast paced arcade basketball machine game, where players are challenged to hit the target scores to move onto the next level and try to beat the highest score. The better the player is, the longer they are able to play!

You need to score as many points as possible within the given time. With each level cleared, the game play will change, with the level of difficulty increasing with each stage.

How to Play:
- Touch a ball and fling it towards the basket to shoot the ball
- Get more and more points / scores to unlock new levels
- Compete your best scores
A Game By Jolta Games Studios
Thanks for the support and feedback.
